reviews.text: New roof and some construction. This company has been the greatest in every area possible. I would give them 10 stars if I could. The crew was the hardest workers I’ve ever seen and so professional. Randy is one of the best communicators ever and since my husband couldn’t take care of this every step as a woman he put up with my questions and was so kind and always available. I would recommend them highly. You don’t get this kind of work ethic and professionalism these days.

So easy, so professional, so fast! I reached out via the online form and someone came out the next day to quote the job. Great pricing and the guy absolutely understood my concerns with water and drainage. Was able to come up with a simple custom (but inexpensive) solution to prevent water from coming off my roof and going into the back yard. I'd recommend this company to anyone.

Next Generation Roofing has done a great job on replacing my roof. It's a family owned business and that's important. Most roofing companies nowadays are run by corporations and they have salespersons but Randy and Chad are owners who deeply care about their business. I would recommend Next Generation Roofing to anyone who is interested to have his or her roof replaced. In addition, Next Generation Roofing has a lifetime warranty and that's even better!

He never returned to finish installing the gutters in the back of my house . Claimed he had to get more materials to finish it . But returned numerous times asking to buy a truck I told him repeatedly I did not want to sell !! He changed company names and locations which just recently discovered the new name we used .

Great experience with a great company! They were quick and affordable but did a great job and it looks great!

Happy to have then work on my house and will recommend them to everyone I know!

Next Generation Roofing did an amazing job with our roof replacement after we had some severe hail damage. Randy, Chad and the team were happy to explain every detail at every step of the way. They walked us through each step, worked with our insurance provider and were great on sight. I couldn’t recommend them highly enough.
From initial contact to following up post completion to ensure every need was met they were professional, punctual, and thorough.

The team did a great job on my roof.  I was needing an area around the chimney reinforced and new flashing installed, and they delivered.  Great customer service, communication, and price.  I highly recommend.

Looking for an honest company who believes in customer care? Next Generation Roofing is AWESOME... great work.. excellent client care and pricing.. workmanship guarantee.. Highly recommend.. first class!!! Next Generation Roofing is simply the best.

This company installed our roof in Hurst today. They completed the installation in one day and did a phenomenal job. We had a great experience working with them from beginning to end. Owners are local and I have known them for a long time. Everyone was professional on the job site and left our home and yard in great condition when the job was completed. Highly recommend Next Generation Roofing and Gutters, LLC!

I was given Next Generation Roofing as a business to contact from my property manager, who I have a great deal of respect for being knowledgeable and honest. After talking with Randy from Next Generation roofing I decided to contract with them to do two of my rental properties. I found Randy to be very knowledgeable and very well organized. When he told me the day and the times that the roof replacement would take place, they were right there on time did an excellent job, and did the replacement

Next generation roofing and gutters installed new Harbor blue Roofing shingles from Lowe’s on my house. The crew were friendly, professional, and efficient. They replaced some vents and installed several new vents. They did a beautiful job, and when they left, my decks and perimeter of the house were cleaner than when they got here. It was refreshing to have such a professional company do the work for me. Today, they are installing my colonial blue gutters and downspouts. Every person of this co

We recently had our roof fully replaced by Next Generation Roofing.  It was a pleasure working with them.  I was nervous about having the work done and they took their time to answer all my questions and concerns.  They arrived on time and did an amazing job.  I would recommend them to anyone.

Julia

I hired Next Generation Roofing to repair rotted eaves in a corner of my house and was happy to hear this job was not considered “too small” for them. The repair was completed expertly with no sign there was ever any damage.  The workers were friendly, on time and respectful of my property. I will definitely call them for future repairs.

I called them about a leak, they were out the next day. Did a quick seal around the area that was leaking. Came out 2 days later and fixed the roof. They are fast and efficient and reasonably priced.  We've used them several times over the years and have been happy every time.

Next Generation Roofing & Gutters replaced my roof. They were prompt,  arriving on time, working all day. The roof looked great when they finished.
The replaced several gaskets and flashing on my skylights. One of the gaskets was over 30 years old.  All of the roof fans & pipes sticking up were spray painted to match the roof.
The cleaning up of the yards & drive way for nails, staples & roof debris was excellent.  I could not find any nails or staples on the ground.
They also showed me where tw

These guys are great! Remodeling and old home that needed a roof. They tore off 2 layers of shingles ( one of them cedar shake) and got new decking up in a very short amount of time. Came back first thing on a Saturday morning and put the new roof on in just a few hours. It looks great! The whole and crew leader were super nice and respectful. Would use them again for sure.

Next Generation roofing replaced my roof. They were extreme professional and more than fair priced. I was impressed how quick they got to me and how fast they got it replaced.  Also found several things my insurance company missed and helped me get the compensation I deserve.  Beyond impress by their crew.

Next Generation Roofing and Gutters is great!  Chad Conway is professional, knowledgeable and on top of everything. He handled everything with my insurance company and made sure that The job was completed on time and done right.  I would highly recommend them for your roofing and gutter requirements!

These guys did my roof and gutters. Very professional. Did my roof in one day (6 hours) and gutters 2 days later.  Highly recommend them and they clean the outside like you would never know they were just there except for the new roof and gutters.  My husband and I were very happy with how they kept you updated

I would like to highly recommend Next Generation Roofing and Gutters L. L. C.They did an awesome job installing my roof and it looks great. Love their ridge row. Definitely stands out from other roofs. Give Randy or Chad a call. They will take care of you.

They installed a roof and cover pergola and the job was done very professionally. Chad and crew was very friendly and answer all questions I had. The crew cleaned and haul off all the trash done a excellent
job. I would refer to friends and family. Job well done
The Next Generation Roofing Team were great. The work went fast and looked really good. Lowe's sourced this company for us and we couldn't have been more satisfied. (South Ft. Worth)

These guys did a great job on my roof. They started immediately in the morning, beating that summer heat, and were done by 2. Before starting they were careful clearing yard items avoiding any possible damage. When they were done, not a single scrap of shingle was left behind. I would use them again without hesitation.

Next Generation came out and did a complete roofing replacement thru Lowe’s. I was extremely pleased with the professionalism, work ethic, and efficiency that they delivered and would recommend their services to anyone needing roofing and gutter replacement!

Working with chad and his crew was the best experience with a contractor that I have ever had . I am not the type that normally does a review good or bad but these guys did a job that deserved a GREAT review. I am a real customer that is REAL happy with the work that was performed. Thanks again

Excellent work and great attention to detail.  We had a full roof, gutter, and downspout replacement on a USAA insurance claim.  They handled all the paperwork once USAA approved the replacement.  We had a steep pitch roof with custom landscaping and HOA limiting alley access to driveway for dumpster removal.  NextGen used plywood to cover windows and shrubs and did hand removal of debris to the street.  The removal went without incident and there was no damage to the landscaping or artificial g
Lowe's and Next Generation did roofing on our house.  Craftsmanship & professionalism was outstanding. !  We highly recommend them !
Randy and his team worked HARD in the heat today to put my roof on!  It looks great. Randy was very nice and great to work with. I appreciate that his company is in the neighborhood!  Thank you!!!

When I tell there efficient I'm not exaggerating.  Less than 6 hours, finished, packed up, and ready to go.  Everything looked great.  Only issue was no one called to let me know they were coming at 6am.
Chad was so helpful! I was and am extremely thankful for their time and efforts in getting my roof replaced quickly.  Thank you so much Chad, Randy, and team!
Next Gen Roofing did a great job on my roof and gutters. The work was outstanding and the clean up was perfect.
They did a wonderful job, for such a good price,  they were quick,and cleaned up after the Job. Would  absolutely recommend  give them 5 🌟.
They did very good work, listened to me when i had questions & cleaned up the job site when they got done
I've used them twice and both times they did the job professionally and on schedule.  Highly recommend!
Removed a wood and paneled chimney, installed panels and roofing in place. Painted exterior. Good work done by Next-Gen!
Everyone was polite and crew was extremely professional. Gutters looks great!  Thank you guys!
Great job and very professional. If you need a roof these are the ones to call!
I have known the owner for quite sometime now. He does things the right way and always goes above and beyond for the homeowner.
The roofing job they did was outstanding attention to detail and cleaned after job was completed
These guys are great, fast service, quality work, great pricing and zero hassle!
Waited  2 weeks  for gutter installation. They never came to do the work. Very unprofessional.
Great professional job! Highly recommend Next Generation for any size job!
The team was very responsive and provided service quickly and efficiently.
On time, quick and efficient, picked up after themselves when done
On time and very professional!
Did what they said they’d do!
